Source code for nbless.main.nbless

#!/usr/bin/env python
from typing import List

from nbconvert.preprocessors import ExecutePreprocessor
from nbformat.notebooknode import NotebookNode

from nbless.main.nbuild import nbuild



[docs]def nbless(filenames: List[str], kernel: str = "python3") -> NotebookNode:
    """Create a Jupyter notebook from text files and Python or R scripts

    :param filenames: a list of source file names
    """
    nb = nbuild(filenames)
    ep = ExecutePreprocessor(timeout=600, kernel_name=kernel)
    ep.preprocess(nb, {"metadata": {"path": "."}})
    return nb
